member.name: T:Enemies.Zombie
member.summary: Defines a zombie with a private health field.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new Zombie with 0 health.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new Zombie with specified health.
member.exception: Thrown when value is less than 0.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.GetHealth
member.summary: Gets the health of the Zombie.
